headline: How Investors Are Reacting To State Street (STT) Launching Its Tokenized Onchain Liquidity Sweep Fund
summary: State Street Investment Management and Galaxy Asset Management recently launched the State Street Galaxy Onchain Liquidity Sweep Fund (SWEEP), a tokenized private liquidity vehicle that uses PYUSD stablecoins for subscriptions and redemptions and is expected to receive an initial US$200,000,000 commitment from Ondo Finance. This move signals State Street's push to integrate blockchain-based cash management with its traditional custody and asset-servicing franchise, highlighting how tokenized...
